Title: Lady of the Night
Writer: Galliano Juso (original story), Galliano Juso (screenplay), Piero Schivazappa
Actors: Serena Grandi, Fabio Sartor, Francesca Topi, Alberto Di Stasio
Plot: Angelina is tired of long serious relationships. One day she is brutally raped and she changes dramatically. Suddenly she is getting involved in more and more dangerous relations with unknown men until her behavior leads to a fatal crime.
